main.name: Zhengyang Wang
main.bio: My name is Zhengyang Wang. Welcome to my portfolio. I design and build software products including games and web applications that solve information problems for individuals and communities around me. This site includes some selected samples of my past works. I am currently working as a game designer in China, and actively applying to Master's programs.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

projects.title: Starside
projects.description: Starside is a fantasy, action, role playing mobile game in an apocalyptic world. You will use the power bestowed by fate to save the future of the world in intertwined reincarnations.

projects.title: The Euphorigen Investigation
projects.description: Explore the depths of misinformation with fun and collaborative games

projects.title: Pawdy
projects.description: Pawdy was my 2022 Capstone project, a web solution for pet owners providing free pet sitting services for UW students.

projects.title: SauvOS
projects.description: An innovative mobile operating system prototype aiming to promote productivity.

projects.title: Esports Infographic
projects.description: A collection of information and data about the influence of Esports. Made in 2019 with Adobe Illustrator
